title: Flick has decided on the Barcelona midfield partnership against Villarreal - report

title: Tehran retaliates with strikes on American military bases

title: PETRONAS rightsizing in progress, next big wave in March
desc: Petroliam Nasional Bhd's (PETRONAS) rightsizing exercise is progressing with the next ‘big wave’ expected in March, followed by the next one in July, its president and group chief executive officer Tan Sri Tengku Muhammad Taufik said.

title: Kempton armed robbery: 2 injured, 19 suspects at large
desc: Police are on the hunt for 19 suspects after a robbery gone wrong in Kempton Park West, where a Community Policing Forum patroller and a tenant were shot.
